caseTitle: Mst. Musarat Parveen v. Muhammad Yousaf and others
tagline: Discussion: (1) Appeal was barred by time and petitioner failed to explain the delay. (2) The law of limitation requires that a person must approach the Court and take recourse to legal remedies with due diligence within the time provided by the law. (3) The law of Limitation is premeditated to dissuade the claims which have become stale by efflux of time.
